name: Sector (itch) (Sambro)
description:
Sector is a 2D topdown platform game that I made as a way to teach myself how to make games

The project is still in development with 4 levels currently playable. It is only playable with mouse and keyboard for the moment.

Thanks to Frederic Doiron for providing most of the audio

Things I plan to add in the future : 

  • Music
  • Controller support
  • Narrative elements
  • Unique sprites and animations for each enemy type
  • Quality of life improvements¸
  • Saving and Loading

Controls : 

  • WASD : Move
  • Mouse : Aim
  • Left click : Attack
  • Right click : Block
  • E : Grapple
  • ESC : Pause

Alt + Enter to go Full Screen
